fields.description:
{html}

4th gen iPod touch (4.1) with mobile sdk build 1.4.2.dc7b90

1.launch KS (be plugged in and viewing console)
2.press the home button
3.tap the icon to open the app and check output

Wed Sep 22 11:58:45 unknown /var/mobile/Applications/08DA1C8D-CAF1-4FAC-9F9D-C1B2D2DF4F65/KitchenSink.app/KitchenSink[1698] : dnssd_clientstub write_all(10) DEFUNCT
Wed Sep 22 11:58:46 unknown /var/mobile/Applications/08DA1C8D-CAF1-4FAC-9F9D-C1B2D2DF4F65/KitchenSink.app/KitchenSink[1698] : dnssd_clientstub deliver_request ERROR: write_all(10, 62 bytes) failed
Wed Sep 22 11:58:46 unknown /var/mobile/Applications/08DA1C8D-CAF1-4FAC-9F9D-C1B2D2DF4F65/KitchenSink.app/KitchenSink[1698] : dnssd_clientstub write_all(10) DEFUNCT

{html}
fields.summary: iOS - backgrounding, then reopening app creates unexpected output

comments.body:
{html}

This is only a problem with TiCore-8, which we don't distribute any longer. We've reverted to TiCore-7, under which the problem doesn't occur; we'll be distributing a new TiCore-9 at some point. Should consider this fixed-in-qa. The "correct" TiCore can be gotten by:

  • Deleting the .txt files in iphone/lib
  • scons
  • And then a rebuild.
{html}
